alert.note: Alert for Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Okeechobee County through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Basinger to 11 miles north of Brighton Seminole Reservation to near Lakeport. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Treasure Island, Okeechobee, Basinger, Four Seasons Estates, and Taylor Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
